name: mob-programming-challenge
description: You've been randomly assigned to a team.   Pick one member of your team to fork the provided repo :   https://github.com/Kostra0ne/mob-programming-challenge.   He/She will invite the other members of the team as collaborators.   The challenge includes several **iterations**.   Work as a **team** and pass the **ball**.   When your turn comes, you are the **driver** and the other are the **navigators**.   Push your code with **explicit** commit messages.
